instruction: Edit the essay to ensure it maintains a professional tone.
input: Not everyone understands computers like I do. It's crazy how much technology has changed in the last decade. I can easily write code or update software while some of my friends can't even turn on the computer.
output: Not everyone is as familiar with computers as I am. It is remarkable how technology has evolved in the last decade. I have a knack for writing code and updating software, whereas many of my peers are unable to power on the computer.
